inputs.remark:
缺少V2，30天的follow up数据
V1 缺少COSI

logic_summary: Added COSI test to V1 encounters as requested.
Added V2 encounter (30-day follow-up) with history, amplified phone trial, and counseling points.

value.name: COSI (Client Oriented Scale of Improvement)
value.key_findings: Administered to identify listening goals. Specific item included ability to hear the television better.

history.present_illness: Returned for 30-day follow-up. Reported adjusting well and finding aids beneficial in most situations. Primary complaint was difficulty hearing over the phone. Also reported wind noise was loud when gardening.
history.patient_goals: Improve phone communication; manage wind noise.

tests.name: Amplified Telephone Trial
tests.key_findings: Patient used the amplified telephone available in the clinic and reported it was much better than her phone at home.

tests.name: Hearing Aid Check
tests.key_findings: Wind program (Program #4) checked and found to be working well. Patient had forgotten to use it.

counseling_points: Recommended purchasing an amplified telephone similar to the one in the clinic.
Reinstructed patient to use Program #4 when outdoors/gardening.
